title: ISic001466. I.Sicily inscription 001466
body:
Facsimile Images

Ἀριστογείτο̄ ε̄̓-
μὶ ((·)) το͂ Ἀρκαδίονος
hὸς hυπὸ Μοτύ-
ϝαι ((⋮)) ἀπέθανε

Apparatus criticus

Text of IGPalermo

English translation

I am (the stele) of Aristogeitos, son of Arkadion, who died below (the walls of) Motya

commentary
